name: Subterrain
notes: Set glsl to disabled in your lutris wine runner. Ignore all warnings at the end of the installation process.

files.installer: N/A:Select the game's GOG setup file

content:
files:
- installer: N/A:Select the game's GOG setup file
game:
  exe: drive_c/GOG Games/Subterrain/Subterrain.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    description: Installing...
    executable: installer
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
